page.title: 11LEISURE IN HOLYWELL'S PARK
page.content: Leisure pursuits are well-catered for. The{Fron Park}has a children's playing area,tennis courts,miniature golf,five a side football pitch and bowling greens.Seating is available for people to enjoy the well-laid out gardens.The {swimming baths}have weekly club nights and are used for Galas and other water activities.The{Library}holds a good selection of books,also exhibitions, story hours and activity clubs for children.Literary and History Clubs holds film and book evenings there.The {Youth Centre}is used by teenagers on Club Nights and weekly meetings of Brownies and Guides.Daytime use is by the Playgroup and groups (gardening, knitting,sewing etc) set up to allev- iate the boredom of unemployment.The WRVS Centre caters for the weekly Over 60s Club.The{Assembly Hall}is used for charity concerts and badminton games.
